name: Caffinated
description:
Caffinated is an endless arcade runner where you play as an Office Worker who is addicted to caffeine.

Where you must run around the office collecting caffeinated beverages while avoiding obstacles for a hi-score. If you don't collect caffeinated beverages, your withdraws will increase and eventually you will die.

Controls:

Arrow Keys: Move

X: Jump

Spacebar: Pause

Left Mouse Button: Click Buttons

Mouse: Move Cursor Around

Backspace: Hi-Score Reset

I hope you enjoy Caffinated and I hope you look forward to my future games! And don't forget to comment and review!
